items.title: Awesome Irc
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Web Monetization
items.content_text:
### Resources / Tools

*   [Paytrackr (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/thomasbnt/paytrackr) - (Forked from [wobsoriano/paytrackr](https://github.com/wobsoriano)) - Track and manage your micropayments into one place.

    > PayTrackr is the easiest and safest way to track and manage your micropayments to web monetized websites, having a web monetization provider membership.
items.content_html:
Resources / Tools

  • Paytrackr (‚≠ê2) - (Forked from wobsoriano/paytrackr) - Track and manage your micropayments into one place.

    PayTrackr is the easiest and safest way to track and manage your micropayments to web monetized websites, having a web monetization provider membership.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Games

*   [DiabloBlazor (‚≠ê106)](https://github.com/n-stefan/diabloblazor) - ![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/n-stefan/diabloblazor?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=604800) ![last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/n-stefan/diabloblazor?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=86400) Blazor port of DiabloWeb, making it a double WebAssembly app: a WebAssembly (C#) PWA hosting a WebAssembly (C++) game. [Demo](https://n-stefan.github.io/diabloblazor).
items.content_html:
Games

  • DiabloBlazor (‚≠ê106) - Blazor port of DiabloWeb, making it a double WebAssembly app: a WebAssembly (C#) PWA hosting a WebAssembly (C++) game. Demo.

items.title: Awesome Engineering Team Management
items.content_text:
### Facilities / Standups

*   [Noise, Cognitive Function, and Worker Productivity](https://joshuatdean.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/NoiseCognitiveFunctionandWorkerProductivity.pdf) - ‚ÄúAn increase of 10 dB reduces productivity by approximately 5%.‚Äù

### Product Management / User-Centered Design

*   [The product roadmap is dead: welcome to the age of problem roadmaps](https://medium.com/product-managers-at-work/the-product-roadmap-is-dead-welcome-to-the-age-of-problem-roadmaps-7c7745ac8ae0) - ‚ÄúFall in love with your problems and not with your solutions.‚Äù
*   [The Psychology of Design](https://growth.design/psychology/) - An extensive list of cognitive biases and design principles with examples and tips to fine-tune your product and UX.
items.content_html:
Facilities / Standups

  • Noise, Cognitive Function, and Worker Productivity - ‚ÄúAn increase of 10 dB reduces productivity by approximately 5%.‚Äù

Product Management / User-Centered Design

  • The product roadmap is dead: welcome to the age of problem roadmaps - ‚ÄúFall in love with your problems and not with your solutions.‚Äù
  • The Psychology of Design - An extensive list of cognitive biases and design principles with examples and tips to fine-tune your product and UX.

items.title: Webcomponents the Right Way
items.content_text:
### Component Libraries

*   [Apollo Elements (‚≠ê420)](https://github.com/apollo-elements/apollo-elements) - Custom elements for using Apollo GraphQL with various web components libraries.
*   [Blackstone UI (‚≠ê103)](https://github.com/kjantzer/bui) - Web components for creating interfaces by Blackstone Publishing.

### Starter Kits

*   [custom-element-boilerplate (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/github/custom-element-boilerplate) - Boilerplate for creating a custom element.
*   [hello-web-components (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/fernandopasik/hello-web-components) - Simple starter hello world web component written in TypeScript.
items.content_html:
Component Libraries

  • Apollo Elements (‚≠ê420) - Custom elements for using Apollo GraphQL with various web components libraries.
  • Blackstone UI (‚≠ê103) - Web components for creating interfaces by Blackstone Publishing.

Starter Kits

  • custom-element-boilerplate (‚≠ê170) - Boilerplate for creating a custom element.
  • hello-web-components (‚≠ê29) - Simple starter hello world web component written in TypeScript.

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Modules / Utils

*   [deno\_cron (‚≠ê101)](https://github.com/rbrahul/deno_cron) - A cron Job scheduler that allows you to write human readable cron syntax with tons of flexibility
*   [rubico (‚≠ê282)](https://github.com/richytong/rubico) - üèû \[a]synchronous function composition; it just works.
items.content_html:
Modules / Utils

  • deno_cron (‚≠ê101) - A cron Job scheduler that allows you to write human readable cron syntax with tons of flexibility
  • rubico (‚≠ê282) - üèû [a]synchronous function composition; it just works.
